FALEMOS.CameraEffectNotes: Effect to be applied to the video
FALEMOS.OverlayOffsetNotes: Overlay offsets for Bottom, Up, Left and Right sides
FALEMOS.CameraGeometryNotes: Geometry to be applied to the video
FALEMOS.CameraNameColorNotes: Set the colour, position and size of the banner
FALEMOS.SceneFitNotes: Fit the scene so that the image covers the entire scene or so that the image is seen in its entirety.
FALEMOS.ExportConfigToMacroNotes: Saves the settings of this scene in a macro, when used it sets the same settings in the visible scene. Used to make scene templates (Ex: '3 large vertical cameras - scifi')..
FALEMOS.VoiceModeAlwaysHint: Check this option to always transmit voice
FALEMOS.vaccinator.title: Falemos' autoconfig parameters
FALEMOS.vaccinator.marginsHint: Space in pixels to leave at left/top/right/bottom of the cameras layout
FALEMOS.vaccinator.rowsHint: Number de rows of the cameras layout
FALEMOS.vaccinator.columnsHint: Number de columns of the cameras layout
FALEMOS.vaccinator.separationHint: Minimum separation in px between too consecutive cameras
FALEMOS.vaccinator.emptyslotsHint: Empty slots where no cameras are allocated (comma separators), numbered from 1 to rows*columns
FALEMOS.vaccinator.usernamesHint: Player names defined in the game world
FALEMOS.vaccinator.playerorderHint: Player's order in the layout. Must be a sequence of positions of the users in the order they are shown in the box 'Users' above. Ex: 2,3,1 means that the third user goes at the first free slot and the first user goes second. Set to 0 to remove the player from the layout
FALEMOS.vaccinator.simulateHint: Shows a table with a simulation of the current layout
FALEMOS.vaccinator.framesHint: Images over the cameras. Multiple selection; if there is only one image, it will be used for all users, in there are multiple images (comma separators) it will be assigned to users in order
FALEMOS.vaccinator.overlaysHint: Percentage the frame is extended to the left/top/right/bottom beyond camera limits
FALEMOS.vaccinator.hideHint: Select which layout elements to hide when enabling Falemos
